Module postprocess¶

class postprocess.ECs¶

Calculate elastic constants

set_analytics()¶

Standard analysis including: Calculation of elastic constants, cross validation score and plot of the energy strain curves.

set_gsenergy(gsenergy=None)¶

Read groundstate energy for all atoms in structures.

get_gsenergy()¶
set_structures()¶

Import structures object from file.

get_structures()¶
get_atomsByStraintype(strainType)¶

Sort structures by strain type to get an ordered list of distortions.

set_fitorder(fitorder)¶

Set fitorder of polynomial energy - strain fit.

get_fitorder()¶
set_etacalc(etacalc)¶

Set maximum lagrangian strain for the fitting procedure.

get_etacalc()¶
set_C(A2, etacalc)¶

Evaluate elastic constants from polynomials.

get_C(A2, etacalc)¶
